hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Deku Stick Capacity# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Bow#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #3# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Elevator Room Recovery Heart 3

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #stable#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Water Temple Compass# and #the Prelude of Light#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Recovery Heart

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
